personalInfo.title: Status
values: Холост
Женат/замужем
В разводе

personalInfo.title: Пол
values: Мужской
Женский
Не скажу
I like to do sport; I regularly go to the gym.
I plan to engage in sports activities but this is happening irregularly yet.
I have many weaknesses and drawbacks.
I have a high self-esteem.
My room is always tidy.
I don’t really try to keep a clean and tidy room.
It’s nice to work alone because you are not responsible for other people.
Working as a manager gives an important sense of responsibility for other people.
I am interested in the new in the fashion world.
Some “fashionable” things irritate me.
It’s hard for me to sit still.
I have a calm temper and prefer no to rush.
In all my failures only I am to blame and not other people and circumstances.
Sometimes circumstances and other people interfere with my plans.
I like that my desk is always neat.
I like organized chaos. Pedantry is not about me.
I am a very good doer, if the manager clearly formulates a problem.
I often take control by myself and strive to decide what will be done and how
I like surprises.
I like the predictability of events.
I think that I am a person of activity.
I think that a more settled way of life is suitable for me.
Sometimes I feel like I’m a looser.
I almost always win.
I come to the meeting on time or a bit early, it is very important.
Sometimes I’m late for meetings. In a big city with traffic jams, this is a common thing.
While moving towards the goal, a person may encounter many obstacles. More experienced people can help avoid mistakes.
If I am confident in the chosen goal, it’s very difficult to influence my actions.
I lose interest when the answer is clear ahead of time.
I prefer the familiar and the proven.
I like doing several things at a time.
If I have several tasks planned, I do them sequentially: first one, then another.
A rupture is not preferable to a patchwork peace.
Thought thrives on conflict.
I like difficult tasks that require perseverance and eagerness.
I choose to deal with the matters that do not require a lot of time first, and then everything else.
I’m OK with someone controlling my work at different stages.
I’m not comfortable with the idea of someone checking my work until it's finished.
For me, it’s natural to fantasize and dream about something.
I prefer to come down to earth.
I prefer to walk fast in museums, because I can view many paintings.
In the museum, I prefer to walk slowly carefully examining the most interesting things.
People should help each other.
Everyone should be able to take care of themselves.
I was a diligent student at school.
At school, it was hard for me to sit still.
It is much easier to correct mistakes during the work than after the task is finished.
It’s much easier to accomplish a task and then fix the flaws.
I prefer to read adventure novels, mystery novels, science fiction; everything happening there is unpredictable.
I am fascinated by scientific literature and classics; everything is realistic there.
I withstand loneliness with no challenge, but communicating with people is what gives energy.
I feel OK in a big company, but I rest alone or with the loved ones.
There is always an opportunity to negotiate and meet halfway.
Both parties are unhappy with trade-offs. To achieve the goal, one party will have to give in.
I believe that success is achieved through hard work and persistence.
I think that success comes to those who are lucky and talented.
My loved ones can call me several times a day.
I do not like frequent phone calls from my loved ones.
I spend part of my time deep in thought.
I do not like to spend a lot of time thinking, I am a person of action.
I easily get acquainted with new people.
It’s easier for me when a stranger is introduced by one of my friends or colleagues.
I like the people around me, and I am pleased to be part of the team.
The goal of each person is his/her personal happiness and the happiness his/her loved ones. If you want to make people happy, make yourself happy first.
It’s important to plan your future.
Life can and should be unpredictable.
I often experience loneliness, sadness and unwillingness to do anything.
I'm optimistic and never depressed.
I know well what beauty and elegance are.
My concept of beauty is pretty much the same as that of others.
I think it's great to expand your circle of acquaintances and friends.
I think it’s best to have a few friends for constant communication.
Most people try to be decent.
Most people are afraid of punishment, and often only this stops them.
I am very upset by failures.
Do not pay attention to failures on the way towards the goal.
My mood depends on the circumstances.
It's hard to bring me down.
I would take acting classes.
I would take financial literacy courses.
I love being in a big and fun company.
I prefer solitude and silence.
I think it’s natural for people to cooperate.
I think it’s natural for people to compete.
A failure can throw me off my stride for a while. Every failure needs to be well thought over.
People make mistakes, I am no exception. Today you fail, tomorrow you get lucky.
There was a lot of tragedy in my life.
In all situations, I find silver lining.
Works of art delight me.
Not every work of art can impress me.
I like watching extreme sports competitions.
I do not understand why people engage in dangerous sports.
The best managerial approach is to explain in a polite and tactful way what needs to be done.
Often, orders are better understood than explanations and persuasions.
I think over decisions before making them.
I make decisions quickly.
I think life makes some people evil.
Most people are kind by nature.
I react strongly.
It's almost impossible to throw me off balance.
Thrills make you feel alive.
I prefer to avoid dangerous situations.
If I’m appointed manager I will not refuse, but I myself will not burst into management.
I take the role of leader with pleasure and take the initiative.
I control my feelings and desires.
I follow my desires. If I want something, I do it.
There are people whom I do not like.
I usually like the people with whom I communicate.
My mood easily shifts.
I am always calm and cool-headed.
I think that carnivals, holidays and parties bring pleasure.
Pleasure is relaxing in a secluded place.
I respect the opinions of other people and listen to them.
If I know that I’m right, then the opinion of seniors by age or status does not really matter.
I make a shopping list and try not to go beyond it.
I like to spoil myself with unplanned pleasant things.
Sometimes I am suspicious of other people
Most people are honest and can be trusted.
I can get so uneasy that I can cry.
I never cry, it's hard to set my nerves to edge.
I feel good when they pay attention to me.
I am a humble person and I do not like to draw attention to myself.
It’s easy to hurt my feelings.
I’m comfortable with other people making statements about me.
I am a forethoughtful person; I think over several options.
The life doesn’t evoke anxiety. If a problem arises, I’ll solve it then.
I try to be friendly to all people
I’m not kind to each and every person.
I like to make people smile and surprise them.
I am always who I am. I'm not trying to make people like me.
I can attract people's attention and do it easily.
I do not attract people's attention, I do not need it.
I worry that something unpleasant can happen in my life.
I’m not at all worried about possible troubles.
I carefully plan my trips.
Unplanned adventures are the most memorable.
I always act tactfully.
I hurt feelings of others sometimes in joke and sometimes intentionally.
I think life is a game.
Life is an experience passed on to future generations
I like that people pay attention to my appearance.
In public settings, I usually do not stand out with fashionable clothes and behavior.
I like to listen rather than to speak.
In the company of friends, I often find myself in the spotlight.
I think that hard work is the main thing if you what to be successful.
I think that any task is easier to do if you trust your intuition and inspiration.
I always try to be kind and considerate to everyone.
I’m reserved with strangers; I’m kind and considerate only with friends and relatives.
Sometimes I feel like I can discover something new in myself.
People do not change, but only adapt to circumstances
